text: John Robert Purvis, CBE (6 July 1938 â€“ 20 March 2022) was a British Conservative politician. He was a MEP for Mid Scotland and Fife from 1979 until 1984 and from 1999 to 2009. He was one of Scotland's seven MEPs. Purvis was born in St Andrews, Scotland. Purvis died on 20 March 2022 from cancer in Edinburgh, Scotland at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Conservative Party (UK) people Category:MEPs for the United Kingdom Category:Politicians from Fife
title: John Purvis
